data.description: Login to the portal is reachable via the path /XX_module_c/admin
Login data for admin created as described
DB-dump contains FK-constraints and correct columns
At least 1 comment per file For the part where competitors write on. Not for the framework built-in code.
There are git commits At least 3 commits.
One or more extra branch is created Aside from the main/master branch. Any branch name accepted.
PHP code is easy to maintain
Git commit messages is readable and easy to understand
Only test success, and test invalid only in one place, to avoid double deducting marks for the same error.
If the upload fails because of the described reasons, the response contains plain text explanation of the error.
User not authored of the game, zip file extraction fails, file size too big
If the game exists, uploading a new file create a new version If the game exists, uploading a new file create a new version
deleted game is hidden from the API list
Posted game score is saved to the latest version
If the `POST` or `PUT` request had invalid fields, they are validated and a response is returned that lists the violations.
If the consumer makes a call to a path that requires the auth header to be present, but provides an invalid or not existing auth token, response as described
Non-existing API If the consumer makes a call to a non-existing path, or a resource that does not exist, this must be the response:
Administrator can block a game Blocked game is not listed public.
Administrator can block a developer Developer cannot login after blocked. An error message showed
Tabbing between input fields are in logical order Accessibility inspector > sort order
Form is protected from SQL Injection Choose an input to test, choose by team and be consistant.
The admin can see all admin users in the database with username, created timestamp and last login timestamp.
The admin can see all platform users with username, registration timestamp, last login timestamp and click a link to their profile page.
Link format to specific user as described /XX_module_c/user/:username, where :username is replaced with user’s username
The admin can block and unblock users given a choice of reasons.
The blocked user's profile is no longer reachable and instead treated as it would not exist 404
If the user was already logged in, they will be logged out and shown the reason the next time they interact with the backend.
The admin can see all games with title, description, thumbnail, author, all version timestamps and click a link to the game page.
A text input to allow admin to filter listed game. Only show the games with title, description, author containing the text input value.
Link format to the game as described /XX_module_c/game/:slug
The admin can mark a game as deleted in the database. The admin still sees it with status "deleted".
The admin can see all scores of all players per game.
The admin can reset the highscores for a game. This means all game's scores are removed from the database and the players will not see them anymore.
The admin can delete a single player score from a game.
The admin can delete all scores of a single player for a given game.
Header Visual Bar with title and page title
App Title: WorldSkills - Games. Page title reflects the main content title
Document title must reflect the shown page title Page
title content is included as whole or part of the document title.
Register, Sign In, Sign Out button.
If the user is not signed in, show 'Sign In' and 'Sign Up'.
If the user is signed in, show Sign Out
Developer can upload a game via zip Able to unzip uploaded file. New version is created every time when uploaded.
Developer can edit game meta Title, description
Developer can un-publish existing game Un-published games is not viewable in public, but viewable to developer
Developer can view game matrix of the uploaded games Play time, unique players, high scores
Developer can view the game status of blocked
For each game, all fields as described shownuses
Thumbnail uploaded thumbnail.png file if provided, or general image file.
And should go to /XX_module_d/ after signed-up
Only one password field in sign-up form
Response message is shown after server response
The current page is reflected in the URL. A page refresh shows the list on the same sort settings.
In infinite scroll, there are no pages, but scrolling triggers loading of more games.
An initial number of games are loaded so they overflow the user's screen.
If the user scrolls towards the end of the loaded games, more games are loaded.
It never loads all games to save bandwidth. Loaded games are also rendered.
It only loads as many games that are needed to render enough items so the user does not see the end of the list.
Shows username, authored game section, game high scores section.
If the user has not uploaded any games, the authored games section is omitted.
Required information is shown per authored game
game title, description, thumbnail, number of submitted scores, and not the authored user.
If the active user is looking at their own profile page, they also see games that have no version yet. They are also offered a button to "Manage Game".
Games without version is hidden to other users visit
high scores list in user profile The list shows highest the scores per game, and the game list is sorted by game title alphabetically
If a user tries to reach game management page without being the author, they are redirected to the game itself
This page renders the game in an iframe and shows the current highscores
The high score list is updated with 5 second polling interval
Player's score is interleaved into the highscores.
If the user is within the top ten, the current user score is part of the top 10 score
If the user highest score is not within the top ten, the score is appended to the end of the top 10 list, but shown without rank.
Player's score is highlighted when within the top 10 list Any form of highlighting(such as bold, or colored).
When the game ends, the user is asked if they want to publish their score
Game posting API is done via parent page instead of embeded iframe game page inside iframe
Game score is sent to parent page from within the iframe game page via postMessage
When the game score posts, the leaderboard should be updated immediately instead of waiting for the polling interval Only for score that breaks the highest score of the current player
Accessibilty, checked by Chrome Lighthouse (Warning allowed) (Choose only accessibility)
Link Purpose (Link Only) meet WCAG 2.4.9 requirement for game listing page
Choice of colors, typography, spacing between the elements enhances the overall look and feel
The marketing page is accessible via required URL XX_module_F/
High fidelity website presentation graphics for SNS is provided A file named “social-network” with extension JPEG, or PNG, or PDF is provided
Presentation file contains required information Containing one page design showing a long capture of the whole page; Main color palette; Website title
The main color palette is present in the delivery All text content is readable by screen reader
Testing with NVAccess, with screen reader viewer, and should see all text content, including text content inside images.
Text size can be scaled up and down From 50% to 200% at least
Heading levels are correct Each session has its own heading, following the heading hierarchy
Heading color contrast follows WCAG guide Large text contrast ratio Body color contrast follows WCAG guide Use Firefox developer accessibility panel to check. Body  text contrast ratio
The page contains all the content required Title, sub title, big promote banner for platform debut, Big four features, parent company information, game platform roadmap for 2023.
The submitted design source has well organized layers.
Align of elements, in the marketing page

Excellent use of white space to enhance legibility and readability, permiting an easy identification of elements and content. The content is clearly identified because the correct use of white space and the white space is proportional between the elements or blocks of content.Create an aesthetically pleasing and creative design
Use of typography to improve readability
Visual identity is consistent in all components in the web page
Execent hierarchy with information organizing in a way that's usable, accessible, and logical to the everyday site visitors.Grouping of information
Design match with the target audience
Layout for desktop has no full page horizontal scroll bar Intentional components horizontal scrollbar is fine. Full page broken with scrollbar is not fine
Layout for mobile has no full page horizontal scroll bar Intentional components horizontal scrollbar is fine. Full page broken with scrollbar is not fine
In the features section, can toggle features by clicking on the feature title

As described in Test Project, there are 4 features, click on each should show one and only one image, which is the image of the selected feature. The tabs should work even when JavaScript is disabled.
Create easy to maintain HTML code
Create easy to maintain CSS code
The images chosen for features presenting can enhance the understanding of the game platform and features
Use adapted elements for different screen resolutions or different devices
Ecosystem roadmap image is created based on the draft image, and integrate well into the page
The roadmap present the bright future of vision from the company in a confident way
